Posts.Content: Hi my sister has breast cancer, she is 64 and not in the best of shape, she tried chemo, but with the final treatment she almost died. Now, she can't have any more treatments or surgery, I am wondering, if there are any groups, or if people have tried, diets, if so, what type of diets, etc. that may help to improve her life, or to help her with the end stages of life. my email address is --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ----
Posts.Title: my Sister
